results.title: Down by law
results.creator_credit: Jim Jarmusch, Alan Kleinberg, Grokenberger and Black Snake
results.brief_description: It is a sad and beautiful world that provides the setting for Jim Jarmusch’s third feature. It seems like a world of bad luck and trouble to Jack and Zack. These deadbeats may well have deserved a comeuppance, but not jail, certainly not for the long haul, and absolutely not in the same cell together. The big-talking, foolish Jack and the sullen, daydreaming Zack are mutually repellent. A new convict is pushed into their cell, an Italian tourist, Roberto. Somehow the three manage to escape and they wind up in the trackless bayou, pursued by bloodhounds. stars Tom Waits, John Lurie, Roberto Benigni and Ellen Barkin.

results.title: Pergolas
results.creator_credit: Rod Parker and Do It Yourself Videos
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Do It Yourself Home Video Workshop. Series 1”.
Instructional video which shows how to build a pergola with professional results. After the desired location is determined the viewer is instructed how to measure and design the pergola and what council permits may be required. Timber, hardware and tool requirements are discussed before a step-by-step demonstration of preparation and construction techniques.

group.title: Do It Yourself Home Video Workshop. Series 1

results.title: Tiling floors
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Do It Yourself Home Video Workshop. Series 1”.
Michael Byrne demonstrates how to prepare an ideal surface for tiling, how to apply adhesive for proper coverage, how to cut tile efficiently, use decorative borders, mix mortar, incorporate expansion joints and shape a shower recess so it won’t leak. This program is companion to the book, “Setting Ceramic Tile” (The Taunton Press, 1987) and page references appear in the corners of the screen.

results.title: Timber fences and gates
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Do It Yourself Home Video Workshop. Series 1”.
Enables the beginner to construct fences and gates with professional results. It introduces various fencing and gate designs, advising the viewer on material and tool requirements. It suggests wood and general preparation techniques and finally advises on the construction and assembly of gates and fences.

results.title: Dr Coppelius = El Fantastico mundo del Dr Coppelius
results.creator_credit: Ted Kneeland, Frank J. Hale, Frank J Hales Productions and Copelia
results.brief_description: Based on the ballet Coppelia this film adaptation focuses more on the Doctor and his wonderful mechanical dolls as the central plot to the story rather than on Coppelia, the doll itself. The principal characters of the story are: Dr Coppelius (played by actor Walter Slezak), a practical joker who dabbles in witchcraft and sorcery and loves making life-like mechanical dolls, Franz (Caj Selling) the young lover who does not realise that the beautiful Coppelia is one of the Doctor’s mechanical dolls, Swanhilda (Claudia Corday), Franz’s bride-to-be, and Brigitta (Eileen Elliott), the tavern maid secretly in love with Dr Coppelius. The story is based on an original libretto by Charles Nuitter and music by Leo Delibes. Features the members of the Ballet of the Gran Teatro Del Liceo of Barcelone and the International Cine Ballet and the Orchestra of the Gran Teatro Del Liceo of Barcelone under the direction of Adrian Sardo.

results.title: Doubletalk
results.creator_credit: Alan Beattie and Learning Corporation of America
results.brief_description: Shows a young man calling for his first date with a girl when he is invited in to meet her parents. The sound track reveals not only the spoken conversation, but the unspoken thoughts of all the characters.

results.title: Garden watering systems
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Do It Yourself Home Video Workshop. Series 1”.
Instructional video that advises the viewer on designing and installing a watering system specifically for their home. It suggests tool and material requirements, offers measurement and design advice and demonstrates the installation of drip, pop-up lawn, garden-bed and automatic watering systems. It also offers some general watering tips.

results.title: Do It Yourself Brick Paving
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Do It Yourself Home Video Workshop. Series 1”.
This video instructs the beginner on how to achieve professional brick paving results. It introduces different paving styles, and advises the beginner on how to calculate material requirements, how to prepare a surface and eventually how to pave.

results.title: Down to the sea
results.creator_credit: Giles Walker, National Film Board of Canada and Fisheries Research Board of Canada
results.brief_description: Opening with the poignant story of a herring fisherman whose life’s work is endangered by man’s careless exploitation of the living resources of the sea, this film looks at the frontiers of technology in fisheries research. Emphasises the use of undersea technology, including scuba diving, underwater sleds, and a new two-man submarine of revolutionary design.
